dct_title_s: Répresentation du Cours ordinaire des Vents de TRAVERSE qui regnent sur les Cotes dans la grande MER DU SUD
dct_description_sm: Lower part of California shown with eastern coastline continuing north beyond 47 deg. N. Tropical tradewinds shown, as often found on Moll maps. Includes much of Asia and partial coastline of N. Guinée and Nou. Hollande. Based upon Halley’s wind map of 1686.

With title in French: Répresentation du Cours ordinaire des Vents de TRAVERSE qui regnent sur les Cotes dans la grande MER DU SUD. Engraved by: Gravé par Cosmant. (bottom left). Title in rectangle at map top, within neat line. Text in rectangle at map bottom, within neat line: Rémarquez que les Fleches qui sont entre les Lignes montrent le Cours ordinaire de ces Vents de Côte. "Tab.2." (top left); "T.XI.No.XI" (bottom right).
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
